H0.text: Who played Doctor Christmas Jones in the Bond film The World is Not enough. Halle Berry

H1.text: Who played Doctor Christmas Jones in the Bond film The World is Not enough. Teri Hatcher

H3.text: Who played Doctor Christmas Jones in the Bond film The World is Not enough. DeniseRichards

A4.text: Richards was cast as the nuclear physicist Christmas Jones in the James Bond film The World Is Not Enough (1999).
